name: booklist
description: A book management web app for exploring modern web technologies.  Think ToDo, but more realistic

scripts.react-build: cd react && npm i && npm run prod-build && cd ..
scripts.svelte-build: cd svelte && npm i && npm run prod-build && cd ..
scripts.install-web-apps: cd react && npm i && cd ../svelte && npm i && cd ../booklist-ui && npm i
scripts.build: npm i && npm run booklist-ui-build && npm run react-build && npm run svelte-build
scripts.master-build: npm i && npm run install-web-apps && npm run react-build && npm run svelte-build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run heroku-install && npm run react-build && npm run svelte-build
